text: You walk out of your front door onto the street. The sun is high in the sky and the small population of the town is opening shops and hurrying to work. Until suddenly out of the corner of your eye you see it, Ze Apple Juicer, the crossroads of fate open up before you. Do you choose to enter such a glorious establishment? Or do you turn your back on greatness to forge your own path. Your choice has been made and the dice has been cast as you walk towards your destiny.
